``` console
npm install twexxor-subtraction-calculator
```
``` javascript
const twexxorSubtractionCalculator = require('twexxor-subtraction-calculator');
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('1', -10); // '11'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator(38, '4'); // '34'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator(Infinity, '0'); // false
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('0.000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000200', '0.0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001000'); // '0.0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001twexxorSubtractionCalculator('1e-49', '-1e-49'); // '0.0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('1e-49', '1e-49'); // '0'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789', '1'); // '123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456788'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator(123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789, '1'); // '123456789123456779999999999999999999999999999999999999'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789.10', '1.001'); // '123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456788.099'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator(-1, -2); // '1'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('0000000000', 0); // '0'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('-00', 10); // '-10'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('-000123456.00000078900', 10.2340); // '-123466.234000789'
twexxorSubtractionCalculator('-0.000000123456789123456789', '1.01010101010101010101010101010101'); // '-1.01010113355779922446689001010101'
